entities.name: aberforth
entities.description: Aberforth is mentioned as a person who had an argument with Grindelwald. He pulled out his wand and was dueling with Albus and Grindelwald.

entities.name: grindelwald
entities.description: Grindelwald is mentioned as a person who got angry when Aberforth tried to stand in the way of him and his brother. He used the Cruciatus Curse on Aberforth.

entities.name: albus
entities.description: Albus is mentioned as a person who was trying to stop Grindelwald from using the Cruciatus Curse on Aberforth. He was dueling with Grindelwald and Aberforth.

entities.name: aberforth's sister
entities.description: Aberforth's sister is mentioned as a person who would not have to be hidden once the world had changed.

relationships.description: Grindelwald got angry with Aberforth when he tried to stand in his way.
Albus was trying to stop Grindelwald from using the Cruciatus Curse on Aberforth.
Grindelwald mentioned that Aberforth's sister would not have to be hidden once the world had changed.
Albus was trying to stop Grindelwald from using the Cruciatus Curse on Aberforth, which implies that he is concerned for Aberforth's sister.
